portfolio_seo_description: Track stocks and ETFs in real time, get AI insights and price alerts, and visualize performance, risk, and dividends. A fast, free portfolio tracker for investors.
portfolio_seo_keywords: stock portfolio, portfolio tracker, stock tracker, ETF tracker, investment tracker, watchlist, price alerts, performance analytics, dividends, P&L, portfolio management
portfolio_structured_description: Personal stock and ETF portfolio tracking tool with real-time prices, AI analysis, alerts, and performance analytics.
portfolio_empty_description: Fill it up with your favorite stocks and get realtime data and the latest news in one place!
portfolio_no_news: No news yet. Add some stocks to the portfolio to see the latest news.
portfolio_no_earnings: No earnings data available. Add some stocks to the portfolio to see the latest earnings data.
portfolio_modal_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this portfolio? This action cannot be undone.
portfolio_toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again!
portfolio_toast_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
portfolio_toast_title_long: Title is too long. Keep it simple and concise bruv!
portfolio_toast_already_in_portfolio: This symbol is already in your portfolio
portfolio_toast_select_symbols: You need to select symbols before you can delete them
portfolio_analysis_seo_title: Portfolio Analysis - AI Insights, Fundamentals & Diversification
portfolio_analysis_seo_description: Get AI-powered bull/bear analysis, valuation metrics, growth insights, and diversification breakdown for your stock portfolio. Compare your holdings against market benchmarks.
portfolio_analysis_seo_keywords: portfolio analysis, AI portfolio insights, bull bear analysis, portfolio valuation, growth metrics, portfolio diversification, investment analysis, portfolio fundamentals, stock analysis, market benchmarks
portfolio_analysis_structured_descriptio: Comprehensive portfolio analysis tool with AI-powered bull/bear insights, valuation metrics, growth analysis, efficiency ratios, and diversification breakdown.
portfolio_analysis_vs_market_description: Shows your portfolio's weighted-average Valuation, Growth, Efficiency and Margins compared to US market benchmarks - revealing if your holdings are expensive/cheap, growing/shrinking, efficient and profitable vs the broader market.
portfolio_diversification_hhi_info: Herfindahl-Hirschman Index measures portfolio concentration. Lower scores indicate better diversification. HHI < 1500: Well diversified, 1500-2500: Moderate concentration, > 2500: High concentration.
portfolio_diversification_sectors_info: Number of unique sectors and industries in your portfolio. More sectors and industries generally indicate better diversification across different market segments.
portfolio_diversification_largest_info: Percentage of your portfolio in the single largest holding. Generally, no single position should exceed 15-20% to maintain proper diversification and risk management.
portfolio_diversification_top5_info: Percentage of your portfolio in the top 5 largest holdings. Top 5 < 50%: Well diversified, 50-70%: Moderate concentration, > 70%: High concentration risk.
portfolio_diversification_empty_descript: Add stocks to your portfolio to see diversification analysis
portfolio_bullbear_empty_description: Add tickers to your portfolio to analyze it
portfolio_bullbear_loading_description: Evaluating positions, concentration, and strategic implications
portfolio_bullbear_disclaimer: This summary was generated by AI based on your portfolio holdings. It should not be considered investment advice. Please conduct your own research.
portfolio_bullbear_toast_login: Please log in to use this feature.
portfolio_bullbear_toast_upgrade: This feature is available exclusively for Subscribers. Please upgrade your plan.
portfolio_bullbear_toast_credits: Insufficient credits. Your current balance is {credits}. This feature costs {cost} credits.
portfolio_bullbear_toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
portfolio_overview_empty_perf: Add shares and average price to view performance chart
portfolio_overview_health_empty: Add assets to your portfolio to view health status.
